Name: Training as a Technical System Planner (aGw*)
Tags: systemplaner bamberg deggendorg muenchen coburg azubi teil
Beschreibung: With your training as a Technical System Planner HLSK (aGw*), you will join our team starting from 01.09 and take on a key role within our company group. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Basic drawing training and creation of CAD plans in 2D/3D
Hands-on work by participating in projects
Planning the supply of buildings with heat, cold, air, and water together with colleagues
Cross-location work on exciting, innovative, and demanding projects in an international team
Eigenschaften:
You have good spatial visualization skills
You have technical understanding and mathematical knowledge
You enjoy working with the computer
You are a team player, reliable, and have an independent working style
You have at least a secondary school diploma

Name: Specialist Planner HLSK (aGw*)
Tags: fachplaner frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Coburg, Deggendorf, Munich, Frankfurt, Berlin, Stuttgart, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As a Specialist Planner HLSK (aGw*), you take on a key role in the realization of our projects and significantly contribute to the development of our company group. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Execution of demanding and exciting TGA projects through all stages of HOAI
Development of innovative, resource-saving system solutions
Conceptualization, planning, tendering, and possibly object supervision of TGA projects
BIM planning with digital twins and 3D modeling
Eigenschaften:
You have a completed degree, master/technician qualifications in supply and building technology or a comparable education.
You feel at home in the field of heating, ventilation, sanitation, or air conditioning.
Your motivation lies in creating innovative, resource-saving system solutions.
You are familiar with relevant standards, guidelines, and common project management tools like Revit, Orca, or Plancal Nova.
You work independently and quickly grasp complex issues
You take initiative and are a team player.

Name: Project Manager HLSK (aGw*)
Tags: projektleiter frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Coburg, Deggendorf, Munich, Frankfurt, Berlin, Stuttgart, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As a Project Manager HLSK (aGw*), you take on a key role in the realization of our projects and significantly contribute to the development of our company group. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Responsibility for the technical and economic execution of TGA projects through all phases of HOAI
Leading, coordinating, and managing your project team, along with close collaboration with all project participants and the management team
Organizational and technical handling with the client
Cost and schedule management
Point of contact for clients and partners throughout the entire project process
Eigenschaften:
You have a completed degree or master/technician qualifications in supply and building technology or a comparable education.
You feel at home in the fields of heating, ventilation, sanitation, or air conditioning.
Your motivation lies in creating innovative, resource-saving system solutions.
You are familiar with relevant standards, guidelines, and common project management tools like Revit, Orca, or Plancal Nova.
You work independently, are reliable, and take initiative.

Name: Project Manager ELT (aGw*)
Tags: projektleiter frankfurt berlin muenchen stuttgart coburg bamberg deggendorf sofia varna voll
Standort: Coburg, Bamberg, Deggendorf, Munich, Frankfurt, Berlin, Stuttgart, Sofia, Varna
Beschreibung: As a Project Manager ELT (aGw*), you take on a key role in the realization of our projects and significantly contribute to the development of our company group. (*all genders welcome)
Aufgaben:
Responsibility for the technical and economic execution of TGA projects through all stages of HOAI
Leadership, coordination, and management of your project team, as well as close collaboration with all project participants and the management team
Organizational and technical handling with the client
Cost and schedule management
Point of contact for clients and partners throughout the entire project process
Eigenschaften:
You have a completed degree, master/technician qualification in supply and building technology, or a comparable education.
You are familiar with the field of electrical engineering and have several years of professional experience in leading projects in this area (LPH 1-9).
You are well-versed in relevant standards, guidelines, and common project management tools such as Revit, Orca, or Plancal Nova.
You have an independent working style and quick comprehension of complex issues, with an economic sense when handling projects and always keeping costs in mind.
You are self-reflective, a team player, and strong in communication.
